text: FC Telavi is a Georgian football club which last played in Erovnuli Liga 2. The team will play in 2020 Erovnuli Liga. == History == The club was founded in 2016 by the former football players: Irakli Vashakidze, Soso Grishikashvili and Aleksandre Amisulashvili. ვინ თქვა, კახეთში ფეხბურთი არ უყვართო?! თელავში გუნდი ფეხბურთელებმა აღადგინეს == Recent seasons == Source Soccerway, Erovnuli Liga 2 Soccerway, Erovnuli Liga 2, 2019 :{|class="wikitable" |-bgcolor="#efefef" !
